# Walk the Valley - Healthcare Innovation Podcast

## About
Walk the Valley is a bi-monthly podcast featuring healthcare innovation entrepreneurs navigating from discovery to commercialization. We provide real-world advice from 50+ medtech experts across 25+ episodes.

## Main Pages
- Home: https://walkthevalley.lovable.app/
- Episodes: https://walkthevalley.lovable.app/episodes
- About: https://walkthevalley.lovable.app/about
- Contact: https://walkthevalley.lovable.app/contact

## Topics Covered
- Healthcare innovation and commercialization
- Medtech product development
- Mental health technology
- Neonatal care solutions
- Startup funding strategies
- Clinical trials and research
- Regulatory navigation (FDA, CE marking)
- Market validation
- Supply chain management
- Clinical workflow integration
- US market entry strategies

## Contact
For guest applications, partnerships, or inquiries, visit: https://walkthevalley.lovable.app/contact

Full documentation: https://walkthevalley.lovable.app/llms.full.txt
